code: import'../css/style.css';import'../css/responsive.css';import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import'../App.css';import slideshowFirstImage from'../img/1.webp';import slideshowSecondImage from'../img/2.webp';import slideshowThirdImage from'../img/3.webp';import slideshowFourthImage from'../img/4.webp';import slideshowFifthImage from'../img/5.webp';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Slideshow(){const[selectedRadio,setSelectedRadio]=useState("radio1");const changeSelection=radioId=>{setSelectedRadio(radioId);};useEffect(()=>{const intervalId=setInterval(()=>{changeSelection(prev=>{let nextNum=parseInt(prev.replace("radio",""))+1;if(nextNum>5)nextNum=1;return"radio"+nextNum;});},5000);return()=>clearInterval(intervalId);},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"slideshow",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"photo-slider",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"photo-slides",children:[[...Array(5)].map((_,index)=>{const radioId="radio".concat(index+1);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"radio",name:"radio-btn",id:radioId,checked:selectedRadio===radioId,onChange:()=>changeSelection(radioId),readOnly:true},radioId);}),[slideshowFirstImage,slideshowSecondImage,slideshowThirdImage,slideshowFourthImage,slideshowFifthImage].map((image,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"slide ".concat(index===0?"first":""),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:image,alt:"Slide ".concat(index+1)})},index)),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"navigation-auto",children:[...Array(5)].map((_,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"auto-btn".concat(index+1)},index))})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"navigation-manual",children:[...Array(5)].map((_,index)=>{const radioId="radio".concat(index+1);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:radioId,className:"manual-btn",onClick:()=>changeSelection(radioId)},index);})})]})});}export default Slideshow;
